name: Junk Jamboree
description:
The World has Ended, And Only Fine Art Has Survived!

At an old junkyard 2 robots work together to join scrap to create new works of art. How did the world end? That's not important. Boot up and get creating.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY

The aim of the game is to make post-apocalyptic fine art. You can do so in 3 easy steps.

1. Look at the incoming order.

2. Use the glue cannon to lather necessary objects in glue.

3. Use your belly to smack objects into on another.

4. When all items of scrap are combined aim for one of the active tubes.

5. Sit back and admire your work.

___________________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

- Use A and D to move around

- Hold W to jump

- Hold S when in the air to fall quicker

- Press the space-bar to switch to the glue cannon and click to fire

- Click the mouse when near glued trash to launch it with your belly

________________________________________________________________________________________

**MUSIC USED***

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Edoy/introspection/compassion

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Bubamara_Brass_Band
